summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that validate Dask array’s random number generation utilities, checking correctness, reproducibility, chunk handling, serialization, naming consistency, and edge‑case behavior across different random generators.
business_intent: Guarantee that random array creation in Dask works reliably in distributed environments, delivering deterministic results when required and matching NumPy semantics, thereby supporting data‑science and analytics workloads that depend on reproducible random sampling.
